name: Compliance Missing Cases
description: Tests that the agent correctly identifies missing or unknown compliance items and offers remediation.

scenarios.name: CPR Certification Missing
scenarios.description: Caregiver is missing CPR certification. Agent should detect the gap and offer scheduling.

scenarios.name: CPR Certification Unknown
scenarios.description: Caregiver CPR status is unknown. Agent should flag it and help resolve.

scenarios.name: CPR Certification Present (control)
scenarios.description: All certifications are valid. Agent should confirm compliance with no gaps.
